title: Project Morkx
shortDescription: AI chatbot using OpenAI, Next, Express, EC2, ECR, Vercel, Docker, Tailwind CSS, and Github Action. The model in OpenAI is trained and inspired by my friend.

title: NAVOO Frontend
shortDescription: NAVOO is a comprehensive SaaS platform built on Microsoft 365, offering modular solutions for intranet, governance automation, and collaboration. I contributed to frontend development and customization of key modules using SPFx, Fluent UI, and Tailwind CSS, ensuring seamless integration with SharePoint and a consistent user experience across the Microsoft ecosystem.

title: GUM
shortDescription: GUM is a centralized solution for managing guest users in Microsoft 365 securely and efficiently. It’s delivered as a standalone web app, SharePoint app, and Microsoft Teams app, allowing organizations to control guest access with role-based permissions for viewing, editing, and creating users—all from one place.

title: Board Management
shortDescription: Digital meeting management solution designed to optimize board structures and workflows. Supports agenda creation, resource handling, and participant management with tight Microsoft 365 integration.

title: Smart Archive
shortDescription: SmartArchive is an SPFx-based command set tool integrated into SharePoint document libraries, enabling users to efficiently manage files, folders, and sites for archiving and restoration.

title: Personal Websites V3
shortDescription: Built to stay up to date with modern web trends using Next.js for hybrid rendering. Leveraged Vercel CI/CD, CloudFront, and Route 53 for performance and scalability.

title: Territory Storage Solution
shortDescription: A standalone React app with Tailwind CSS and Azure AD authentication for managing Azure Blob Storage. Admins can generate hashed SAS URLs that allow external users to access and manage files anonymously. The UI mimics Azure Storage for familiarity.

title: AICPA and CIMA
shortDescription: A secure portal for accounting professionals to manage memberships. Served as acting team lead and lead reviewer for both frontend and backend, ensuring high standards through SonarQube and Sentry.

title: Personal Websites V2
shortDescription: Redesigned version of my portfolio using JAMstack principles and moved to AWS S3 and CloudFront for improved performance and scalability.

title: LiveToGive
shortDescription: A social platform integrated with the Strava API, featuring posts, reactions, and a dynamic leaderboard. Led development and mentored junior devs. Delivered full-stack web and mobile in under 3 months.

title: MoonTrekker
shortDescription: A web, mobile, and backend leaderboard project adapted from LiveToGive. Reused over 95% of the codebase due to its clean architecture and efficient DB structure.

title: SYF Virtual Exhibition
shortDescription: Led frontend for a web/mobile virtual museum map, integrating Unity via WebGL and enabling real-time video performance with Stream.io.

title: PRIMECore
shortDescription: The flagship CRM of PRIME Philippines. I was one of the pioneer developers handling architecture and development across web, mobile, and backend layers.

title: PRIME Philippines Website
shortDescription: From 2016 to 2020, I led the yearly updates of the PRIME Philippines website. Introduced a frontend migration from Laravel to React with PHP compatibility for legacy support.

title: Personal Websites V1
shortDescription: The first iteration of my personal site using Gatsby, SSR, and Contentful CMS, deployed to shared hosting.
